name: Catch the Thief (dabfredo)
description:
Controls: mouse and keyboard

This prototype was made for the Gamecodeur Game Jam #34 https://itch.io/jam/gamecodeur-gamejam-34

Theme : Lode Runner

I wanted to play from the point of view of the guards. I worked on it about 8hours and was able to make the guard moves, use ladders and ropes (with arrow keys) and spawn other guards (with left click).
